page.title: 05INDUSTRIAL ESTATE GREENFORD
page.content: Covers an{area}of about{1 square {km.}The building of the canal (1805), the railway (1904) and the Western Avenue (1926) attracted industries to a once agricultural area. Here are some:-Glaxo(Chemicals)Ltd, Lyons Maid (Food), Mothers Pride Bakery, Lyons Tetley (Tea coffee), Sol Tenco(Coffee) Butlers Ltd. (Warehousing Distribution), Florasynth Ltd (Chemicals, IBM Ltd. Recent development of the new motorway networks has brought{many smaller new {companies}like :-Faspak (Containers)Ltd,Link Wholefood Ltd, CBF Electrical Wholesale, Aura Books. There are also{warehouse and factory {spaces}to rent for any new companies eg The Fairway Estate has 22 units and the Metropolitan Centre has 20. Industry brought more housing too.
